            </gmd:citation>
            <gmd:abstract>
                <gco:CharacterString>On behalf of the Rural Municipality of Yellowhead, Toews Environmental Ltd. led studies on Shoal Lake, Manitoba, to inform development of a lake water level management plan and possible future initiatives to improve water quality in the lake.  The water quality study comprised collection of water samples and in situ measurements from four locations on the lake in March, June, July, August and October 2018.  Laboratory analyses focused on nutrients and related parameters including metals and phytoplankton taxonomy.  Measurements from near the lake bottom at the deepest site will allow assessment of internal phosphorus loading.</gco:CharacterString>
            </gmd:abstract>

keywords_translation_method.fr: Keyword text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

name: 10-25976-hntg-w602
notes: On behalf of the Rural Municipality of Yellowhead, Toews Environmental Ltd. led studies on Shoal Lake, Manitoba, to inform development of a lake water level management plan and possible future initiatives to improve water quality in the lake.  The water quality study comprised collection of water samples and in situ measurements from four locations on the lake in March, June, July, August and October 2018.  Laboratory analyses focused on nutrients and related parameters including metals and phytoplankton taxonomy.  Measurements from near the lake bottom at the deepest site will allow assessment of internal phosphorus loading.

notes_translated.en: On behalf of the Rural Municipality of Yellowhead, Toews Environmental Ltd. led studies on Shoal Lake, Manitoba, to inform development of a lake water level management plan and possible future initiatives to improve water quality in the lake.  The water quality study comprised collection of water samples and in situ measurements from four locations on the lake in March, June, July, August and October 2018.  Laboratory analyses focused on nutrients and related parameters including metals and phytoplankton taxonomy.  Measurements from near the lake bottom at the deepest site will allow assessment of internal phosphorus loading.
notes_translated.fr: Pour le compte de la municipalité rurale de Yellowhead, Toews Environmental Ltd. a mené des études sur le lac Shoal, au Manitoba, afin d'éclairer l'élaboration d'un plan de gestion du niveau d'eau du lac et d'éventuelles initiatives futures visant à améliorer la qualité de l'eau du lac. L'étude de la qualité de l'eau comprenait la collecte d'échantillons d'eau et des mesures in situ à quatre endroits du lac en mars, juin, juillet, août et octobre 2018. Les analyses de laboratoire se sont concentrées sur les nutriments et les paramètres connexes, notamment la taxonomie des métaux et du phytoplancton. Des mesures prises près du fond du lac, sur le site le plus profond, permettront d'évaluer la charge interne en phosphore.

description_translated.en: DataStream is an open access platform for sharing water and sediment quality data.
description_translated.fr: DataStream est une plateforme en libre accès pour partager des données sur la qualité de l'eau et des sédiments.

title_translated.fr: Programme environnemental de surveillance de la qualité de l'eau de Toews
